verse: श्रुतिर्माता पृष्टा दिशति भवदाराधन विधिम्, यथामातुर्वाणी स्मृतिरपि यथा वक्ति भगिनी । पुराणाद्या ये वा सहजनिवहास्ते तदनुगा, अतः सत्यं ज्ञातं मुरहर भवानेव शरणम् ॥
overall_meaning: The Vedas, as a mother, ask you to show the way of devotion, just as a mother speaks, even the Smriti speaks like a sister. Those who easily follow the Puranas and others, following that, the truth is known. O Krishna, killer of Mura, you alone are the shelter.
